attributes.action: bring back the death penalty for baby p's mother and step father
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this poor baby boy suffered a short terrible life due to 2 crazy so called human beings. a prison sentence isnt enough justice, any other country would inflict death on them which is no less than they deserve. please lets do something for this little boy and let him have justice for the awful life he led

rejection.details:
Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Crueltytokids/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
